00059 
00060 EGS_UnionGeometry::EGS_UnionGeometry(const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms,
00061         const int *priorities, const string &Name) :
00062         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name) {
00063     ng = geoms.size();
00064     if( ng <= 0 ) egsFatal("EGS_UnionGeometry::EGS_UnionGeometry: attempt "
00065           " to construct a union geometry from zero geometries\n");
00066     is_convex = false;
00067     if( ng == 1 ) egsWarning("EGS_UnionGeometry::EGS_UnionGeometry: why "
00068          "do you want to make a union out of a single geometry?\n");
00069     g = new EGS_BaseGeometry* [ng]; nmax = 0; int j;
00070     int *order = new int [ng];
00071     if( priorities ) {
00072         // user has definied priorities
00073         // order them using a very simplistic algorithm
00074         bool *is_used = new bool [ng];
00075         for(j=0; j<ng; j++) is_used[j] = false;
00076         for(j=0; j<ng; j++) {
00077             int imax;
00078             for(imax=0; imax<ng-1; imax++) if( !is_used[imax] ) break;
00079             int pmax = priorities[imax];
00080             for(int i=0; i<ng; i++) {
00081                 if( !is_used[i] && priorities[i] > pmax ) {
00082                     imax = i; pmax = priorities[i];
00083                 }
00084             }
00085             order[j] = imax; is_used[imax] = true;
00086         }
00087         delete [] is_used;
00088     }
00089     else {
00090         // user has not definied priorities
00091         for(j=0; j<ng; j++) order[j] = j;
00092     }
00093     has_rho_scaling = false;
00094     // now put the geometries into the array of geometries in
00095     // decreasing priority order.
00096     for(j=0; j<ng; j++) {
00097         int i = order[j];
00098         g[i] = geoms[j];
00099         g[i]->ref(); int n = g[i]->regions(); if( n > nmax ) nmax = n;
00100         if( !has_rho_scaling ) has_rho_scaling = g[i]->hasRhoScaling();
00101     }
00102     delete [] order;
00103     if( !nmax ) egsFatal("EGS_UnionGeometry::EGS_UnionGeometry: all geometries"
00104             " have zero regions?\n");
00105     nreg = nmax*ng;
00106 }
00107 
00108 EGS_UnionGeometry::~EGS_UnionGeometry() {
00109     for(int j=0; j<ng; j++) {
00110         if( !g[j]->deref() ) delete g[j];
00111     }
00112     delete [] g;
00113 }

00115 void EGS_UnionGeometry::printInfo() const {
00116     EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00117     egsInformation(" geometries:\n");
00118     for(int j=0; j<ng; j++) egsInformation("   %s (type %s)\n",
00119             g[j]->getName().c_str(),g[j]->getType().c_str());
00120     egsInformation(
00121             "=======================================================\n");
00122 }

00124 extern "C" {
00125 
00126 EGS_UNIONG_EXPORT EGS_BaseGeometry* createGeometry(EGS_Input *input) {
00127     if( !input ) {
00128         egsWarning("createGeometry(union): null input?\n");
00129         return 0;
00130     }
00131     vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> geoms; vector<string> gnames;
00132     int err = input->getInput("geometries",gnames);
00133     if( err || gnames.size() < 1 ) {
00134         egsWarning("createGeometry(union): missing/wrong 'geometries' input\n");
00135         return 0;
00136     }
00137     for(unsigned int j=0; j<gnames.size(); j++) {
00138         EGS_BaseGeometry *gj = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(gnames[j]);
00139         if( !gj ) egsWarning("createGeometry(union): no geometry named %s "
00140                 "defined\n",gnames[j].c_str());
00141         else geoms.push_back(gj);
00142     }
00143     if( geoms.size() < 1 ) {
00144         egsWarning("createGeometry(union): must have at least one geometry\n");
00145         return 0;
00146     }
00147     vector<int> pri;
00148     err = input->getInput("priorities",pri);
00149     int *p = 0;
00150     if( !err ) {
00151         if( pri.size() == geoms.size() ) {
00152             p = new int [pri.size()];
00153             for(int i=0; i<pri.size(); i++) p[i] = pri[i];
00154         }
00155         else egsWarning("createGeometry(union): the number of priorities (%d)"
00156           " is not the same as the number of geometries (%d) => ignoring\n",
00157           pri.size(),geoms.size());
00158     }
00159     EGS_BaseGeometry *result = new EGS_UnionGeometry(geoms,p);
00160     result->setName(input);
00161     result->setLabels(input);
00162     if( p ) delete [] p;
00163     return result;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void EGS_UnionGeometry::getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs) {
00167 
00168     // label defined in the sub-geometries
00169     vector<int> gregs;
00170     int shift=0;
00171     for (int i=0; i<ng; i++) {
00172 
00173         // add regions from set geometries
00174         gregs.clear();
00175         if (g[i]) g[i]->getLabelRegions(str, gregs);
00176 
00177         // shift region numbers according to indexing style
00178         for (int j=0; j<gregs.size(); j++) {
00179             gregs[j] += i*nmax;
00180         }
00181 
00182         // add regions to the list
00183         regs.insert(regs.end(), gregs.begin(), gregs.end());
00184 
00185     }
00186 
00187     // label defined in self (union geometry input block)
00188     EGS_BaseGeometry::getLabelRegions(str, regs);
00189 
00190 }
